text: Hi I was just wondering if HubSpot has a roadmap where we can view what updates/features are going to be rolled out?
Hi, i'm working with Boilerplate theme, but i can't find how to create a new drag and drop template like this :
i don't see the option to create a new drag&drop template
@here Does anybody knows (broadly) how to integrate (coding) vtex with HubSpot? seems like vtex io is the way, but not sure. Thanks a lot in advance.

Drag and drop templates are able to be part of a theme. We do not advise using drag and drop templates for new templates or sites as they do not support many of the new features and capabilities of the CMS.

We have a guide if you need to convert an existing site to themes from drag and drop.

Has anyone had this kind of issues before?
